Articles.Content:
hi.
my os version is 10.11.2 el capitan
and x code is 7.3.1
I'm needed a gcc compiler plugin for my Xcode for some c programming,i need this compiler because im a stuednt and this is the tool the university use.
every gcc is 4.9 or higher will be great.
its possible to do it?
and what are the real difrences between the compilers?

Hi Avilolo, welcome to the KSP forum, I'm sure you'll enjoy it here!

I've moved your thread to the Lounge since it's not a discussion about KSP.

Looking forward to seeing what you get up to in KSP in the future.

Probably not the best place to ask. I'd recommend asking on StackExchange, probably the StackOverflow subsection or SuperUser sub.

Also, this: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9353444/how-to-use-install-gcc-on-mac-os-x-10-8-xcode-4-4 Might help even if it's old.

and x code is 7.3.1
